sn32.13-52:3.1: 13–52 How Giving Helps to Become a Warm Cloud God, etc.
sn32.13-52:4.2: Seated to one side, that mendicant said to the Buddha:
sn32.13-52:4.3: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of warm clouds …
sn32.13-52:4.7: “Mendicant, it’s when someone does good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
sn32.13-52:4.9: ‘The gods of rainy clouds are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
sn32.13-52:4.11: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the gods of rainy clouds!’
sn32.13-52:4.14: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the gods of rainy clouds.
sn32.13-52:4.15: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods rainy clouds.”
